title: The 2024 Mercedes-AMG EQE SUV—more power doesn’t make a better EV
description: The AMG treatment is overkill for this electric vehicle.

title: OpenAI launches GPT-4 API for everyone
description: Dropping waitlist, devs can build the GPT-4 language model into their apps.

title: Sarah Silverman sues OpenAI, Meta for being “industrial-strength plagiarists”
description: AI models allegedly trained on books copied from popular pirate e-book sites.

title: Fairphone 3 gets seven years of updates, besting every other Android OEM
description: Fairphone proves the usual excuses for ending Android support aren't valid.

title: Evernote, the memory app people forgot about, lays off entire US staff
description: Launched in 2004, the company once sought to be the world's brain dump.

title: Big Tech can transfer Europeans’ data to US in win for Facebook and Google
description: EU-US data pact approved; privacy advocates to appeal because of US surveillance.

title: Congested transmission lines cause renewable power to go to waste in Texas
description: State’s inefficient grid can't handle the full load it could deliver in ongoing heat wave.

title: Windows 95, 98, and other decrepit versions can grab online updates again
description: Retro-computing fans can download the final updates released for '90s-era OSes.

title: These are the oldest stone tools ever found in the United States
description: Indigenous people have been in the Americas longer than archaeologists once thought.

title: SpaceX is stretching the lifetime of its reusable Falcon 9 boosters
description: Each Falcon 9 booster could fly twice as many times as originally intended.

title: “Vampire facials” promoted by celebs are linked to new HIV cases
description: Health officials are calling for former clients to get retested.

title: Developers restore “retail” Xbox emulators after Microsoft crackdown
description: Dev says package uses new techniques to avoid automatic detection/banning.

title: Review: Exquisite Drops of God brings the world of elite wine down to earth
description: French writer Quoc Dang Tran's evocative adaptation of the influential manga is a delight.

title: Astronomers solve mystery of how a mirror-like planet formed so close to its star
description: The atmosphere is super-saturated with silicate and metal vapors.

title: We can leave the Solar System, but arriving anywhere is not happening soon
description: What if we dropped interstellar ambitions and focused on understanding our home system?
